{{book | title=Tolkien Diary 1999 | image = Tolkien Diary 1999.jpg | illustrator=[[Alan Lee]] | publisher=[[HarperCollins]] | date=[[3 August]] [[1999]] | format= | pages=144 | isbn=978-0261103740 | precededby= | followedby=[[Tolkien Diary 2000]] }} '''''The Tolkien Diary 1999''''' was a blank diary book featuring illustrations by [[Alan Lee]]. ==From the publisher== {{blockquote|A desk diary for 1999 containing paintings and drawings from the anniversary edition of The Hobbit.

This sumptuous week-to-view desk diary is illustrated with full colour paintings and black and white drawings from the bestselling 60th anniversary edition of The Hobbit . Designed to complement the annual Tolkien calendar, this is a diary which will appeal to Tolkien enthusiasts and art lovers of all ages.}} ==See also== *''[[Tolkien Calendar 1999]]'' {{title|italic}} [[Category:Diaries]] [[Category:Publications by title]]
